     <p>
      There is a lot of interest in Affiliate involvement. They are marketers who grow their business by selecting and promoting products of companies that they are not contracted to. They do not have loads of inventory, nor do they need to pay to be connected to companies whose products they market.
     </p>
     <p>
      However, like
      <a href="file:///C:/Users/marva/Pictures/TEMPORARY/OHNO OHNO.jpg" target="_self">
       <img alt="file:///C:/Users/marva/Pictures/TEMPORARY/OHNO%20OHNO.jpg" height="101" src="data:image/jpeg;base64," style="margin: 9px 5px; float: left;" width="102"/>
      </a>
      marketers, they have to maintain a consistent plan of action. They must set a goal as to what they hope to achieve... and they must arm themselves with all the information necessary to become a successful affiliate.
     </p>
     <p>
      I am one of those affiliates, connected to My Lead System Pro, which has an educational curriculum. One of my activities as an affiliate of MLSP in addition to offer help to anyone who seeks my assistance, is to also motivate my readers and fellow marketers to maintain a consistent plan of action; set goals; prepare and follow a daily plan of action.  And as one of those affiliates to whom I offer advice, I too have to LISTEN TO MY OWN MESSAGES... in other words I PREACH TO THE CHOIR...
      <a href="http://mlsp.co/l1gqy">
       http://mlsp.co/l1gqy
      </a>
     </p>
     <p>
      Well, Today was a potpouri of activities for me ... I had been planning to take my puppy to see the vet for days... so today was the day... returned home after some hours and then faced the task at hand... what was that? TAKING ACTION..
      <br/>
      <br/>
      Since I had been "preaching to the choir" for the last few days about being consistent; taking action; make a plan, etc., etc., I had to take my OWN ADVICE... So I started AGAIN with my WEEKLY PLAN... Why AGAIN... because somehow "my COMPUTER ATE MY HOMEWORK".. cannot explain what happened, but it was not where I left it earlier.
      <a href="http://mlsp.co/l1gqy">
       http://mlsp.co/l1gqy
      </a>
      <br/>
      <br/>
      So back to the arduous task, I went... stayed with it until it was completed...
      <br/>
      <br/>
      You are going to find, more often than not, YOUR DAILY SCHEDULE of action taking is not going according to plan... NEVER MIND... even if this delay lasts for a days...
      <strong>
       START OVER
      </strong>
      if you have to... but
      <strong>
       DO NOT GIVE UP ON YOURSELF....
      </strong>
      This online business that we are in is not a
      <strong>
       9 to 5...
      </strong>
      no 2 days are alike... some days will be filled with successful activities and you can
      <strong>
       LAUGH ALL THE WAY TO THE BANK...
      </strong>
      <a href="http://mlsp.co/l1gqy">
       http://mlsp.co/l1gqy
      </a>
      <br/>
      <br/>
      But other days may not be... My desire for you is that you
      <strong>
       STAY FOCUSED
      </strong>
      , STRONG in your RESOLVE to reach your GOAL...
     </p>

      To Your Success
